## Source

## Data Chosen
children_per_woman_total_fertility.csv

### Import data
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
df <- read.csv("children_per_woman_total_fertility.csv", header = T, row.names = 1, check.names = F)
head(df,3)
df <- t(df)
```

```{r}
colnames(df)
qplot(x = df$China)
```
